entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
